changes.title: Fixed Back Buttons and WiFi
items: Fixed Back Buttons and added connecting with saved wifi in WiFi option.

changes.title: Added a Refresh Button
items: Added a Refresh Button and it also works as update time after reconnecting.

changes.title: Reorganized Main Menu
items: Reorganized Scan WiFi and Start Web Server into Apps

changes.title: Changing Color Top to Bottom
items: In WS you can now change colors in the Main Menu

changes.title: Added Settings
items: Added Settings menu to main UI

changes.title: Added NTP (RTC)
items: Displayed live clock on main menu

changes.title: Code Cleanup
items: Reorganized and cleaned up project code structure

changes.title: Web Server
items: Added basic web server with root page showing WiFi info

changes.title: WiFi Credentials
items: Can save and load WiFi credentials from SPIFFS

changes.title: WiFi Scan
items: Scan for available WiFi networks and display on screen

changes.title: Initial Buttons
items: Each button sends output to serial monitor
